snippet: After the Fukushima disaster crippled Japan's nuclear energy sector three years ago, the government pledged the biggest shake up in the history of the fragmented electricity industry to boost competition and contain a surge in power prices....

headline.print_headline: Japan's Power Failure: Bid to Forge National Grid Stumbles
headline.main: Japan's Power Failure: Bid to Forge National Grid Stumbles

lead_paragraph: After the Fukushima disaster crippled Japan's nuclear energy sector three years ago, the government pledged the biggest shake up in the history of the fragmented electricity industry to boost competition and contain a surge in power prices.
